params.name: slideReference
params.doc: The slide to move to. Either the index of the slide or a [`Slide`](#w.Slide.html) from the slideshow.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - The slide that the slideshow changed to.

docs.summary: Change the slideshow's current slide to a specific slide or index.
description: The `changeSlide()` function returns a Promise that is resolved when
the slideshow finishes moving from the current slide to the slide
referred to by `slideReference`.
You can retrieve [`Slide`]($w.Slide.html) objects to pass to the
`slideReference` parameter from your slideshow using the
[`currentSlide`](#currentSlide) or [`slides`](#slides) properties.
If passing a number, note that slide indices in a slideshow are zero-based,
even though they are numbered starting from 1 in the Editor.

such as [changeSlide()](#changeSlide), [play()](#play), [previous( )](#previous), and [next( )](#next).

FAQs.title: How do I toggle my slideshow on and off?
How do I control which navigation buttons appear in my slideshow?
FAQs.markdown:
Set the [`showNavigationButtons`](https://www.wix.com/code/reference/$w.Slideshow.html#showNavigationButtons) property to `true` to show [navigation arrows](https://support.wix.com/en/article/showing-or-hiding-the-navigation-arrows-on-your-slideshow) on your slideshow.

Set the [`showSlideButtons`](https://www.wix.com/code/reference/$w.Slideshow.html#showSlideButtons) property to `true` to show [slide buttons](https://support.wix.com/en/article/showing-or-hiding-the-slide-buttons-on-your-slideshow) on your slideshow.

FAQs.title: How can I move my slideshow to a specific slide?
FAQs.markdown:
Use the [`changeSlide()`](https://www.wix.com/code/reference/$w.Slideshow.html#changeSlide) function with an index number or a [`Slide`](https://www.wix.com/code/reference/$w.Slide.html) object to move to a specific slide in your slideshow.

If using an index number, note that slide indices are zero-based.
